channel.title: IELTS on 42th openheart
channel.description: Recent content in IELTS on 42th openheart

item.title: I am a freshman
item.description: Step out of my comfort zone Sentence We have a new team member onboard from 1st Dec 2020. Please join me in welcoming Kris to Infor and give them your great support in every way possible! Welcome to the team! Thank you. It is my honor to be able to join our team. Don’t spin your wheels! 这里的spin your wheels(cambridge.org) 可以理解为"to waste time doing things that achieve nothing" You’re in good company.

item.title: English
item.description: Apple’s glowing glass sphere is the newest spectacle on Singapore’s skyline Designed by Foster + Partners, the new Apple Marina Bay Sands store(滨海湾金沙店), due to open on Thursday, is a self-supporting dome entirely surrounded by water Physics loves a sphere, its preferred, purest form. For architects though, the box trumps the bubble(盒子胜过透明原型罩). They’re easier to engineer and offer more useful space. The new Apple Marina Bay Sands store in Singapore goes with the physics.
